scenes.background: After justifying your stance on Monicas need to handle tasks, Monica approaches you again, looking stressed.
scenes.description: I really need some help here, this is too much for me to handle alone.

options.text: Let's see how we can redistribute some of your workload.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Monica's stress and offered a solution, showing strong perception and empathy, but motivation could be higher.

options.text: I understand, but learning to manage under pressure is part of growth.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the situation but emphasized the need to grow through challenges, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Maybe you can delegate some tasks to others if it's too much for you.
options.analysis: You provided a practical suggestion but deflected some responsibility back to Monica, showing strong social skills but lower empathy and perception.
